more_info.origin: Natural polymer derived from trees from the genus Styrax  from Southeast Asia .
more_info.products: Many different products, but mainly in pharmaceutical and cosmetic preparations (perfumes, make-up).
more_info.side_effects: None known, but it often contains benzoic acid ().
more_info.dietary_restrictions: None. 906 can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.
